In recent clinical trials submitted to the Alzheimer's Association's annual meeting by Eli Lilly and Company, the new drug solanezumab could slow the progression of the disease by up to three quarters. The new data presented at the annual meeting this week generated cautious optimism among outside observers. The clinical trial results will be submitted for review in the new year. Alzheimer's disease currently has no therapy that can control the death of the cells in the brain. Currently available drugs can only slow the progression of the disease and maintain the function of the dying cells. Solanezumab is a monoclonal antibody that has the ability to specifically target the accumulation of amyloid beta in the brain and protect the function of the individual cells. The abnormal protein accumulation in the brain forms plaque and eventually damages the brain cells. Solanezumab is the hope of Alzheimer's disease research for many years. �音乐的人气排行榜应运而生。 事实上，负责编排这些榜的公司，OCC，定于5月14日英国夏令时13点整在 OCC官网上推出网上点播音乐排行首发榜。 这个榜的排名依据是来自主要的音乐交流网站，比如 Spotify, We7, Deezer等的数据。 这个榜暂时只覆盖音乐，不包括视频，所以YouTube等音频和视频交流网站现在不参加排榜。 OCC估计，去年英国网民到各种音乐交流网站点播的次数达到26亿。 负责编撰美国流行歌曲排行榜的公司发现，现在网上点播的受欢迎程度已经超过付费下载。 去年，在网上点播音乐或视频的消费者占26%，而下载收听的只有17%；YouTube占网上音乐点播市场的55%。 同时，网上付费点播的收入对音像公司的营业额也越来越重要。 在英国，这部分收入占了整个音乐市场营业额的4.5%。

Premier Su Chi-cheng of the American Institute in Taiwan welcomed President Ma Ying-jeou at San Francisco International Airport. President Ma left Taipei on Monday (January 26) and arrived in San Francisco on the same day. He will stop in Los Angeles on his return trip. The president of the Central American country of Honduras, which experienced a military coup last year and forced President Jose Manuel Zelaya to flee the country, was originally planned to visit Taiwan in a previous trip. He will visit the country again this time. President Ma expressed his delight over the return to democracy of the Honduran government. The trip referred to as the "Golden Bear Project" included visits to both Honduras and the neighboring country of the Dominican Republic. He will carry ten tons of humanitarian aid to the Dominican Republic. The aid includes medicine and food, and will be unloaded in the Dominican Republic and then sent to Haiti. The special plane carrying the aid also includes twenty-four hours of stopover in San Francisco. The stopover will include dinner with overseas Taiwanese and meetings with U.S. Congressmen and women.
